# (PART) Data visualisation {.unnumbered}

# What's in the data visualisation FAQ?

Questions related to the following will be documented and answered here:

-   base R plot, e.g. `plot()`, `curve()`, `boxplot()`; or
-   `ggplot2`, e.g. `geom_point()`, `stat_function()`, `theme()`

This section may also answer general questions about improving the quality of data visualisations.
